Welcome to pyNetLogo’s documentation!

This Page

Quick search

Enter search terms or a module, class or function name.

netlogo¶

Created on 21 mrt. 2013

exception netlogo.NetLogoException¶

wrapper around the netlogo java exceptions. As message it contains the message of the java exception

class netlogo.NetLogo(gui=False, thd=False)¶

interface to netlogo

command(netlogo_command)¶

Execute the supplied command in netlogo

Parameters:netlogo_command – a string with a valid netlogo command
Raises :NetLogoException in case of either a LogoException or CompilerException being raised by netlogo.
kill_workspace()¶

close netlogo. Note that the jvm keeps running. At the moment you will need to restart your python session if you would like to create a new link to netlogo.

load_model(path)¶

load a netlogo model.

Parameters:path – the absolute path to the netlogo model
Raise :IOError in case the model is not found
Raise :NetLogoException
report(netlogo_reporter)¶

Every reporter (commands which return a value) that can be called in the NetLogo Command Center can be called with this method.

Parameters:netlogo_reporter – a valid netlogo reporter
Raises :NetlogoException
